title: PreVue
discription: Authentication: Ensure secure login and account creation for personalized experiences.
Authorization: Control access to features and content based on user roles or permissions.
Add to Watchlist: Allow users to bookmark movies or series for easy access.
Movie/Series Search: Implement a robust search function for easy navigation and discovery.
Recommendation: Provide personalized content recommendations based on user preferences and history.

title: GooShopping
discription: JWT Tokens: Implement JWT authentication for secure user sessions and access control.
Location based currency conversion: Automatically convert prices based on the user's location for seamless international shopping.
Add to Cart: Allow users to add items to their shopping cart for easy checkout and purchase.
Searching and Filtering: Provide robust search and filtering options to help users quickly find products based on their preferences, such as category, price range, brand, etc.
